Projects.Title: Drug–Side Effects–Medical Condition Analysis
Projects.Description: Analysed ~2,900 medical records to study relationships between drugs, side effects, and medical conditions.Performed data cleaning, preprocessing, and EDA; applied Apriori association rule mining.Delivered a Jupyter Notebook with visual insights and ML-ready datasets.

Projects.Title: Face Mask Detection using Deep Learning
Projects.Description: Built a real-time face mask detection system using MobileNetV2 (Transfer Learning).Achieved 99.19% test accuracy on a dataset of 11,792 images.Evaluated model performance using accuracy/loss curves and confusion matrix; tested via OpenCV webcam

Projects.Title: Car Dekho – Used Car Price Prediction
Projects.Description: Developed ML models (Linear Regression, Random Forest, Gradient Boosting) for used car price prediction. Performed feature engineering, hyperparameter tuning, and model evaluation.Deployed a Streamlit web application for real-time price prediction.

Projects.Title: DataSpark: Global Electronics Sales Analysis
Projects.Description: Performed EDA on customer, product, and sales datasets to derive business insights.Cleaned, preprocessed, and merged datasets; managed structured data using SQL.Built Power BI dashboards to visualize sales trends, customer behavior, and store performance.

Projects.Title: Redbus Data Scraping and Filtering
Projects.Description: Built a web scraping pipeline using Selenium to extract bus routes, schedules, prices, and seat availability. Stored and managed scraped data in a SQL database for efficient querying and analysis.Developed an interactive Streamlit dashboard enabling dynamic filtering by route, price range, bus type, rating, and availability.
